metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19881 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: In Artifex MuPDF 1.14.0, svg/svg-run.c allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (recursive calls followed by a fitz/xml.c fz_xml_attcrash from excessive stack consumption) via a crafted svg file, asdemonstrated by mupdf-gl.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
